body_html:
I'll update tfcompile to take SavedModel as input, and hook up a call to his C++ library to the rest of the compilation pipeline. The advantage of this approach is that we won't need a pre-processing python script, and we won't need a separate tf_saved_model_library skylark rule.

Yes, please.
